collection: We use **Google Analytics** , **Facebook Analytics** , **Yandex.Metrika** and **Countly** to track usage of our platform, allowing us to edit missing, broken or outdated information and proactively curate content based on usage.
sharing: We will never sell nor share in any way any information about our users to anyone.
We may include anonymized and sampled information in public reports about the progress of PsychonautWiki.
